title: Federated Learning Design and Functional Deepening Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning, distributed computing concepts, and data privacy understanding
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining hands-on practice and discussion-based learning using personal devices, with a focus on practical application through academic literature analysis and case studies

learning_goals: Explain core components of federated learning (client selection, aggregation algorithms, non-independent and identically distributed data management).
Analyze key constraints (communication costs, incentive mechanisms) to consider when designing federated learning systems.
Based on existing research trends, the technical limitations of federated learning and future development directions can be proposed
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
